scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:contract
scripts.ci:link-check: npm run build && (BYPASS_ACCESS_FOR_TESTS=true next start -p 3021 >/dev/null 2>&1 & echo $! > .next/tmp.pid); trap 'PID=$(cat .next/tmp.pid 2>/dev/null || true); [ -n "$PID" ] && kill -9 $PID 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f .next/tmp.pid' EXIT INT TERM; npx wait-on --timeout 60000 http://localhost:3021; mkdir -p test-results/linkinator; npx linkinator http://localhost:3021 --recurse --json --timeout 60000 --max-depth 2 --concurrency 8 --skip "(mailto:|tel:|javascript:|//|/_next/|https?://(?!localhost(:3021)?/)|/api/|/admin($|/))" > test-results/linkinator/report.json
scripts.ci:perf: npm run build && (BYPASS_ACCESS_FOR_TESTS=true next start -p 3022 >/dev/null 2>&1 & echo $! > .next/perf.pid); trap 'PID=$(cat .next/perf.pid 2>/dev/null || true); [ -n "$PID" ] && kill -9 $PID 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f .next/perf.pid' EXIT INT TERM; npx wait-on --timeout 60000 http://localhost:3022; PERF_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3022 node tools/perf/measure.js
scripts.ci:check:optional-calls: sh -c "if git grep -nE '\\?\\.\\(' -- src; then echo 'Found optional call, fail'; exit 1; fi; if git grep -nE '\\?\\.[A-Za-z_$][\\w$]*\\s*\\(' -- src; then echo 'Found optional method call, fail'; exit 1; fi"
